BLOC

About

BLOC is Suffolk Libraries arts project. We're an NPO with funding to provide arts in libraries.

Culture Lab

Contact us

Arts @ Suffolk Libraries

In summer 2017, we were awarded National Portfolio Organisation (NPO) status and £740,000 from Arts Council England to help young people develop arts and culture activities in libraries from 2018-22. We were offically granted NPO status in April 2018. Find out more about the arts in libraries.
